      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17117532">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117532">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117532">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Reference Materials
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117532">
          <p>
           Online
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             Credo Reference
            </em>
            <br />
            Credo Reference provides access to hundreds of reference works, including general and subject specific dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across subject areas--all online, all searchable from one search box.
            <br />
            Location:
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com">
             Online
            </a>
            or search Encompass Search by title to access
           </p>
           <p>
            Selected titles included in&nbsp;Credo Reference:
           </p>
           <ul>
            <ul>
             <li>
              <em>
               Cambridge Encyclopedia of Child Development
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.comvol/487">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Child Psychology and Mental Health: African American Children and Mental Health
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/abcaframmh">
               Online
              </a>
              or search Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Comprehensive Handbook of Personality and Psychopathology: Child Psychopathology
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/wileyppcp">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Handbook of Child Psychology: Child Psychology in Practice
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/wileycpcpp">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Handbook of Child Psychology: Cognition, Perception, and Language
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/wileycpcpl">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Handbook of Child Psychology: Social, Emotional, and Personality Development
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/wileycpsepd">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Wiley-Blackwell Handbook of Childhood Cognitive Development
              </em>
              &nbsp;
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook.do?ta=bkhccd">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Wiley-Blackwell Handbook of Childhood Social Development
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/bkhcsd">
               Online
              </a>
              or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
              <br />
              <br />
             </li>
             <li>
              <em>
               Wiley-Blackwell Handbook of Infant Development, Applied and Policy Issues
              </em>
              <br />
              Location:
              <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.combook/bkhidap">
               Online
              </a>
              or search Encompass Search by title to access
             </li>
            </ul>
           </ul>
           <p>
            <em>
             The Child: An Encyclopedic Companion
            </em>
            <br />
            Location:
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.netlibrary.com/urlapi.asp?action=summary&amp;v=1&amp;bookid=295312">
             Online
            </a>
            or search Encompass Search by title to access
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             Encyclopedia of Child Behavior and Development
            </em>
            <br />
            Location:
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://link.springer.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/book/10.1007/978-0-387-79061-9/page/1">
             Online
            </a>
            or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             Handbook of Giftedness in Children: Psychoeducational Theory, Research, and Best Practices
            </em>
            <br />
            Location:
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-0-387-74401-8">
             Online
            </a>
            or search&nbsp;Encompass Search by title to access
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           Print
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             Encyclopedia of Psychology
            </em>
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library 150.3 E563o v.1-8
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             The Gale Encyclopedia of Childhood and Adolescence
            </em>
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library 305.231 G151e
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             Growing Up: A Cross-cultural Cncyclopedia
            </em>
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library 305.231 B875g
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             Handbook of Attachment: Theory, Research, and Clinical Applications
            </em>
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library 155.92 H236o
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             Handbook of Child Psychology
            </em>
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library 155.4 H236o 2006 v.1-4
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             Handbook of Psychology
            </em>
            <br />
            Location: Trexler Library 150 H236o v.1-12&nbsp;
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17117532" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17117533">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117533">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117533">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117533">
          <p>
           <em>
            For information on scholarly vs. popular information characteristics, see
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=4047073">
             What is Scholarly?
            </a>
           </em>
           <strong>
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            SCHOLARLY, EMPIRICAL ARTICLES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh">
             PsycINFO
            </a>
            <br />
            Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <strong>
            POPULAR MEDIA SOURCES: NEWSPAPERS AND MAGAZINES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-search.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
             <br />
            </a>
            Large and diverse database that contains both scholarly and news/popular resources. Includes many articles in full text.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://news.google.com/">
             Google News
            </a>
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/us/lnacademic" target="_blank">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            Full text of thousands of newspapers and magazines, as well as broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://news.yahoo.com/">
             Yahoo News
            </a>
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17117533" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18458963">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458963">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458963">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text of Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18458938">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458938">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458938">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18457468">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             APA Style
            </strong>
            , see:
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/library/media/content,assets/library/docs/apa_example.pdf">
               APA Style
              </a>
              (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
              <br />
              Examples of in-text and reference list citation formatting.
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/section/2/10/">
               APA Style
              </a>
              (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
              <br />
              General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/DocAPA.html">
               APA Documentation Guide
              </a>
              (University of Wisconsin)
              <br />
              General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
             </li>
            </ul>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
            </a>
            <br />
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt18457468" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652387" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18458941">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458941">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458941">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
